titlestmt.author: Amy C. Schindler

publicationstmt.publisher: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

change.item: Encoded in EAD by Michele Tuohy

repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.abstract: This collection contains newsletters from the Capital Area Microcomputer Society from 1986-1999.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed in 2004 by Amy C. Schindler.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this record group is unrestricted.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming with the laws of copyright. Whenever possible, the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives will provide information about copyright owners and other restrictions, but the legal determination ultimately rests with the researcher. Requests for permission to publish material from this collection should be discussed with the Head of Special Collections andArchives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: All items in this manuscript group were donated to the University Libraries, M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives by Ben-Ami Lipetz on September 2, 1999.

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: The collection contains the newsletter of the Capital Area Microcomputer Society for the period 1986-1999. The organization offered regular meetings, sponsored message boards, educational workshops, and a newsletter to its members who shared an interest in computer technology and software.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains the newsletter of the Capital Area Microcomputer Society for the period 1986-1999.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged chronologically. It has no series.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, Capital Area Microcomputer Society Newsletters, 1986-1999. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the Capital Area Microcomputer Society Newsletters).
